Name: College Kings 2 - Episode 1
About the game: A new era begins! With award-winning writers, a vast, branching narrative and stunning visuals, College Kings 2 pushes the boundaries of adult visual novels. Play as a freshman in California and explore the social dynamics of college through countless choices. Meet a cast of stunning girls each with a unique personality, build authentic connections, live out your sexual fantasies and ultimately, fall in love. CONTINUE YOUR ADVENTURE Pick up where you left off from the first game or start fresh without missing a beat through the choice-driven recap mechanic. PLAY YOUR WAY Make tough decisions and shape your story. Everything you do impacts the world around you. REALISTIC CONSEQUENCES With a unique reputation system that affects how characters perceive you, it’s not just what you do, it’s how you do it. IMMERSIVE SEX SCENES Steamy writing, interactive foreplay and beautiful animations allow you to live out your wildest fantasies like never before. INNOVATIVE GAMEPLAY With an extensive range of unique mechanics including a complex turn-based fight system, College Kings 2 constantly redefines what it means to be a visual novel.
